title: Week 13 Preview: Pandemic Impact, Offensive Game Plans, and Betting Strategies | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
We recap the Ravens-Steelers 'Wednesday Night Football' game (3:00) before we discuss the Week 13 lineup and the games that will influence playoff positioning. Then we discuss angles and strategies for betting on Washington-Steelers (23:00), Patriots-Chargers (38:00), and Titans-Browns (54:00).


Hosts: Warren Sharp and Joe House
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
